github-uikit

Interface building blocks for professional website interaction.

this.();

Robust (yet sleek) Javascript Framework

The Uikit package is a collection of css and javascript that is reliable and comes with good documentation.

Build Responsive Websites Fast

Mobile navigation built-in with off-canvas menu. A sleek and rewarding JavaScript framework.

Installation

Install Github-Uikit's source and JavaScript files via clone, fork, or npm. Package managed installs donâ€™t include documentation or our full build scripts. You can also use our npm template repo to quickly generate a Bootstrap project via npm.

The easiest way to install quickly is to clone the GitHub repository.

git clone https://github.com/isaacjosephhorton/github-uikit.git

Make sure you have jekyll installed and you can run a build test locally with:

bundle exec jekyll serve

Or install it yourself as:

$ gem install github-uikit

Amazing Customizable SVG Icons

Icon set is completely customizable, include your logo or add material design icons. You're in control.

Works perfectly on Github Pages

Made from the bottom up with Github in mind.

Connect

Github-UiKit is a labor of IJH. It is essentially an updated version of jekyll-uikit which can be found on git hub.

Speaking of coffee, if you like this theme, and are feeling like a super awesome person, you can buy me a coffee!

I built it in my free time on weekends and early mornings before my day job. Please feel free to use it under the MIT licence however you'd like. Let me know if you have any questions about it, I'll do my best to help.

I enjoy talking about UI/ UX design, content and branding stratgegy, and creative direction.

Feel free to reach out on Twitter. ;P
